channel.title: Npc Help Please Help Me!
channel.description:
Hello,
Im trying to make a shop that can tele you to 4 places like
Kree`Arra King Black Dragon Chaos Elemental General Graador
and then when you click a name you tele there but idk how to add that can anyone explain me how"? :)
Thanks!!

item.title: Npc Help Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:371566”]I’m confused with what you are asking by a “Shop”

Do you mean a dialogue option that shows all 4 of their names that you can click and teleport somewhere?

Or a custom interface that comes up with 4 different teleport options?[/quote]

I mean a Npc
that can tele you to 4places

Read full topic
